message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to get your hands on something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $110. It's a fair price that I think you'll find reasonable.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'm now offering the product to you for $105. It's a compromise that I think is fair, considering the value of the product.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit higher than $105. I'm willing to meet you at $98. That's as low as I'm willing to go.
